titleStmt.title: Satiro--mastix. Or The vntrussing of the humorous poet As it hath bin presented publikely, by the Right Honorable, the Lord Chamberlaine his seruants; and priuately, by the Children of Paules. By Thomas Dekker.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Edward Allde] for Edward VVhite, and are to bee solde at his shop, neere the little north doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun,

notesStmt.note: A reply to Ben Jonson's satires of Marston and other rival dramatists.
Running title reads: The vntrussing of the humorous poet.
A variant has "Printed by E.A. .." in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, neere the little north doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun
